title: 'Work it': Model closes Maison Margiela Spring/Summer 2020 fashion show with unforgettable walk
text:
This season's lineup of fashion shows has had many surprises (hello J.Lo) including one model's unforgettable catwalk at Maison Margiela.

For the designer's Spring/Summer 2020 show, Leon Dame closed the show wearing a black belted jacket, cadet hat and knee boots.

His fierce walk was truly unique and had many showgoers amazed.

Dame posted his big runway moment on Instagram, and many people left comments like "Best walk ever!"

In an interview with Vogue, Dame said Maison Margiela creative director John Galliano told him to "work it" right before he went out.

Shortly after the show, Dame continued to rise to internet fame with many people chiming in on his big moment.

One Twitter user called the walk her "Wednesday mood" while many others simply called it "interesting."

Maison Margiela's show had an overarching theme inspired by war uniforms. Dame commanded attention and we can't wait to see what he does next.
description: Model Leon Dame storms Maison Margiela Spring/Summer 2020 fashion show with an unforgettable walk.
